topic.title: Threat Monitoring and Integration with HPE ArcSight

section.p: , through its centralized logging infrastructure (Logstash), can be configured to send events and logs to an HPE ArcSight endpoint (connector or ESM or Logger). Integration with HPE ArcSight provides the ability to monitor, analyze, and correlate logs through HPE ArcSight Logger and ESM and supports continuous security monitoring of the entire infrastructure. The HPE ArcSight connector in turn, can be configured to receive logs and events in real time from this Logstash configuration inside an environment, further converting it to a Common Event Format (CEF) and forwarding it to your designated HPE ArcSight endpoint using an encrypted transport protocol.

Integration with HPE ArcSight gives you the ability to monitor, analyze, and correlate logs through HPE ArcSight Logger and ESM. It supports security monitoring for continuous compliance across an deployment including:
infrastructure
services
Guest operating system This integration enables you to preserve your investment in HPE ArcSight security infrastructure by monitoring their entire cloud in addition to your existing IT environment, reducing the time taken to respond to security breaches, and providing faster analysis of security logs and events.
